ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: It is difficult for me to understand how other people are feeling when we are talking.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: Some ordinary textures that do not bother others feel very offensive when they touch my skin.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: It is very difficult for me to work and function in groups.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: It is difficult to figure out what other people expect of me.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: I often do not know how to act in social situations.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: I can chat and make small talk with people.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: When I feel overwhelmed by my senses, I have to isolate myself to shut them down.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: How to make friends and socialize is a mystery to me.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: When talking to someone, I have a hard time telling when it is my turn to talk or to listen.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: Sometimes I have to cover my ears to block out painful noises (like vacuum cleaners or people talking too much or too loudly).
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: It can be very hard to read someones face, hand, and body movements when we are talking.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: I focus on details rather than the overall idea.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: I take things too literally, so I often miss what people are trying to say.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True

ElementDescription: I get extremely upset when the way I like to do things is suddenly changed.
Notes: 1= True Now and When Young; 2= True Only Now; 3= True when I was young; 4= Never True
